messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Here's a problem
messages.msgSnippet: so everything we post is there for the public to view? very disturbing. ... From: Lynda  To: ;
messages.messageBody:
so everything we post is there for the public to view?
very disturbing.
----- Original Message -----
From: Lynda <lurine@...>
To: <Queensland@egroups.com>; <hem-networking@egroups.com>;
<schools_out@egroups.com>; <stillwater-homestead@egroups.com>;
<unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 8:14 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Here's a problem


> Just got this on another list. Haven't had time to investigate it yet but
> thought it was worth passing on.
>
> Lynda
>
> ----------
>
> > I just discovered something very disturbing,
> > eGroups message archives, or atleast messages from them,
> > show up in yahoo searches. Thought everone should know.
> > TFE
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Here's a problem
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 07/07/2000 3:33:02 PM !!!First Boot!!!, kworthen@mediaone.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 07/07/2000 3:33:02 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
kworthen@... writes:

<< o everything we post is there for the public to view?
very disturbing. >>


Did we think it wasn't?

I always assume everything online is pretty public anyway, I guess.

Nance
